text: Night, Silence, Desert is a collaborative album by Iranian musician Kayhan Kalhor with Mohammad Reza Shajarian and others, released on 12 September 2000 in the United States through Traditional Crossroads records. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Kayhan Kalhor – Kamancheh *Mohammad Reza Shajarian – Vocals *Ardavan Kamkar – Santur *Bijan Kamkar – Daf *Behzad Farhoudi – Ney *Hossein Behroozinia – Barbat *Haj Ghorban Soleimani – Dotar ==References== category:Kayhan Kalhor albums category:Persian music Category:Middle Eastern music category:2000 albums
title: Night, Silence, Desert
